name: My Universe - Cooking Star Restaurant
description:
To play this game on PS5, your system may need to be updated to the latest system software. Although this game is playable on PS5, some features available on PS4 may be absent. See PlayStation.com/bc for more details.
Open your dream restaurant!
Enter the world of elite gastronomy and manage your own restaurant from A to Z: hospitality, cooking, waitering, you do it all! Learn from the best chefs in the world, prepare the most delicious meals to make your customers happy and become a true cooking star.
Experience a complete culinary adventure
Take care of your customers every step of the way: give them a warm welcome, take their orders and complete mini-games to prepare their favorite dishes. Every satisfied customer helps improving your reputation and giving you access to additionnal space for your restaurant and new cooking styles!
Learn from the best
As you make progress in your cooking journey, famous chefs from all over the world will join your restaurant to share their secrets: follow their advice and master dozens of tasty recipes inspired from French, American, Indian, Italian and Japanese specialties!
- Move freely around your restaurant and decide how to meet your customers’ expectations
- Customise your chef to match your style: boy or girl, hair and skin colour...
- Prepare dozens of delicious recipes all by yourself: peel, slice, stir… Every dish is homemade in your restaurant!
- Master 5 different cooking styles, 30 recipes and become the ultimate chef
Offline single player
Remote Play allows users to connect to and play games on their PlayStation®4 or PlayStation®5 using a mobile device, PC, or another PlayStation®4 or PlayStation®5.
